lines.text: Hogwash! You're not going to shoot that boy!
I'm from L.A., remember? I kill people for cutting me off in traffic!
You know, I am so *sick* of you chicken fried stakes! I hate chicken! I am sick of you southern hospitality with your
"hiddy-ohs" and "thank yous!" And I'm especially sick of breathing air I CAN'T SEE!
You do business with Marvin, you hate yourself.
Now careful, boys. Now this man here wrote the book on bounty hunting.
He don't even look like he can read a book to me.
Now you crackers are *really* pushin' it.
I am taking this man to the airport. You put your guns away, and we don't have any problems here. Am I gettin' through to any of you?
